translations: v.使腐败；变腐烂（putrefy 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: So researchers extracted chemical compounds from 10 putrefying lamprey carcasses.
sentences.translation: 因此，科学家们从10个腐烂的七鳃鳗的尸体中提取出化学物质。

sentences.sentence: The fruit mixes with the putrefying other food and produces gas and hence you will bloat!
sentences.translation: 水果和腐烂的其它食物混合，制造气体，所以才会使人胃胀。

sentences.sentence: The intact carcass of the prehistoric animal was prevented from putrefying by the arctic cold.
sentences.translation: 史前时期动物的完整尸体，是由于北极严寒的保护不致腐烂。
